casebody.data:
Schapierer, Respondent, v. Third Ave. R. Co., Appellant. (Common Pleas of New York City and County, General Term. November 5, 1891.) Appeal from city court, general term. Action by Jacob Schapierer against the Third Avenue Railroad Company-

Argued before Bookstaver and Bischoff, JJ.

L. & J. Hoadley, for appellant. S. D. Levy, for respondent.

Ho opinion. Appeal dismissed, without costs to either party. See 14 N. Y. Supp. 921.
